mapper.select: SELECT APVL_RDG.APVL_UUID , APVL_RDG.RDG_UUID , APVL_RDG.USR_ID , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS USR_NM , APVL_RDG.RDG_TYP_CCD , APVL_RDG.RDG_TYP_CCD AS ORIGIN_RDG_TYP_CCD , APVL_RDG.USR_DEPT_NM , APVL_RDG.USR_JOBTIT_NM , USR.POSI_CCD , DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD_NM AS POSI_NM FROM APVL_RDG APVL_RDG INNER JOIN USR USR ON USR.TEN_ID = APVL_RDG.TEN_ID AND USR.USR_ID = APVL_RDG.USR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLCD_MULTLANG ON DTLCD_MULTLANG.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD = USR.POSI_CCD AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.CCD = 'C005' WHERE APVL_RDG.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND APVL_RDG.APVL_UUID = #{p.apvl_uuid}
